entity.name: region
entity.query: SELECT REGION_ID, COMPANY_ID, REGION, IS_DEFAULT_BY_SYSTEM, STATUS, CREATED_ON, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_ON, MODIFIED_BY FROM REGION;
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT REGION_ID, COMPANY_ID, REGION, IS_DEFAULT_BY_SYSTEM, STATUS, CREATED_ON, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_ON, MODIFIED_BY FROM REGION WHERE REGION_ID = '${dataimporter.delta.regionId}';
entity.deltaQuery: SELECT REGION_ID FROM REGION WHERE MODIFIED_ON > DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD('${dataimporter.last_index_time}',INTERVAL -1 MINUTE), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i');
